sql.sql: INSERT INTO [PermissionTypes] ([Id], [Scope], [Name], [SortOrder]) SELECT * FROM (SELECT '77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683' AS [Id], 'urn:nucleus:entities:folder/permissiontype/browse' AS [Scope], 'Browse' AS [Name], 2 AS [SortOrder]) AS [NewData] WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [PermissionTypes] WHERE [Id]='77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683');

INSERT INTO `PermissionTypes` (`Id`, `Scope`, `Name`, `SortOrder`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT '77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683' AS `Id`, 'urn:nucleus:entities:folder/permissiontype/browse' AS `Scope`, 'Browse' AS `Name`, 2 AS `SortOrder`) AS `NewData` WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `PermissionTypes` WHERE `Id`='77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683');

INSERT INTO "PermissionTypes" ("Id", "Scope", "Name", "SortOrder") SELECT * FROM (SELECT '77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683' AS "Id", 'urn:nucleus:entities:folder/permissiontype/browse' AS "Scope", 'Browse' AS "Name", 2 AS "SortOrder") AS "NewData" WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM "PermissionTypes" WHERE "Id"='77D424BF-E5EB-4E70-9B08-72ECCE931683');
